description: The Very High Battery Voltage alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery voltage is normal' : 'Battery voltage is very high'

description: The Major High Battery Voltage Alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMajorHighBattVolt

description: The High Battery Voltage alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery voltage is normal' : 'Battery voltage is high'

description: The Minor High Battery Voltage alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMinorHighBattVolt

description: The Very Low Battery Voltage Alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery voltage is normal' : 'Battery voltage is very low'

description: The Major Low Battery Voltage Alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMajorLowBattVolt

description: The Low Battery Voltage Alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery voltage is normal' : 'Battery voltage is low'

description: The Minor Low Battery Voltage Alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMinorLowBattVolt

description: High Battery temperature alarm or
Temperature Compensation circuit / probe failure alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery temperature is normal' : 'Battery temperature is very high'

description: The Major High Battery Temperature alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMajorBatteryHighTemp

description: High Battery temperature alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery temperature is normal' : 'Battery temperature is high'

description: The Minor High Battery Temperature alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMinorBatteryHighTemp

description: The Battery Disconnect Contactor alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery disconnect contactor alarm cleared' : 'Battery disconnect contactor alarm'

description: The Battery Disconnect Contactor alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmBatteryDisconnectOpen

description: The A Bus (primary loads) Contactor is open alarm

event.Summary: The A Bus (primary loads) contactor is open

description: The load Contactor 1 alarm. The contactor disconnect voltage has been
reached and the contactor has disconnected.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmLVD1open

description: The B Bus (secondary loads) Contactor is open alarm

event.Summary: B Bus (secondary loads) contactor is open

description: The load Contactor 2 alarm. The contactor disconnect voltage has been
reached and the contactor has disconnected.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmLVD2open

description: The C Bus (critical loads) Contactor alarm. The contactor dropout voltage has been
reached and the contactor is released.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'The C Bus (critical loads) contactor alarm' : 'The C Bus (critical loads) contactor alarm cleared'

description: The load Contactor 3 alarm. The contactor disconnect voltage has been
reached and the contactor has disconnected.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmLVD3open

description: The AC voltage has dropped below critical level,
or one or more AC input phases was lost.

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'AC voltage has dropped below critical level' : 'AC voltage is normal'

description: The AC voltage has dropped below critical level, or one or more AC input phases was lost.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmACmains

description: Battery string disconnect breaker/fuse alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Battery string disconnect breaker/fuse alarm cleared' : 'Battery string disconnect breaker/fuse alarm'

description: A battery breaker/fuse alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmBatteryBreakerOpen

description: The Load Distribution breaker/fuse alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==0) ? 'Load Distribution breaker/fuse alarm cleared' : 'Load Distribution breaker/fuse alarm'

description: A Load Distribution breaker/fuse alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmDistributionBreakerOpen

description: This is a 'multiple rectifiers have failed' alarm

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Multiple rectifiers have failed' : 'Multiple rectifiers failure alarm cleared'

description: This is a Major Rectifier alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMajorRectifier

description: This is a 'one rectifier has failed' alarm
This is a Minor Rectifier alarm.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMinorRectifier

description: Battery Symmetry (midpoint) Delta Voltage out of 'major fault' limits alarm

event.Summary: Battery Symmetry (midpoint) Delta Voltage out of 'major fault' limits

description: Battery Symmetry (midpoint) Delta Voltage is badly out of limits alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMajorBatteryMidpoint

description: Battery Symmetry (midpoint) Delta Voltage out of limits alarm

event.Summary: Battery symmetry (midpoint) delta voltage out of limits alarm

description: Battery Symmetry (midpoint) Delta Voltage out of limits alarm
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmMinorBatteryMidpoint

description: The battery capacity has dropped below critical level.
A battery test has measured the fully charged capacity to be too low,
and thus probably the battery lifecycle to be near expired.

event.Summary: Battery capacity has dropped below critical level

description: The battery quality has dropped below critical level.
A battery test has measured the fully charged capacity to be too low,
and thus probably the battery lifecycle to be near expired.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmBatteryLifeEnded

description: The system has lowered the battery charge voltage in order to discharge the batteries
to a predefinend level. When the criteria for stopping the battery testing is reached, the
charge voltage is increased to commence normal charging.
The system has lowered the battery charge voltage in order to discharge the batteries
to a predefined level. When the criteria for stopping the battery testing is reached, the
charge voltage is increased to commence normal charging.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmBatteryTestmodeEntered

description: The system has increased the battery charge voltage in order to equalize the
battery cells charging. When the criteria for stopping the battery equalizing is reached,
the charge voltage is lowered to commence normal charging.
The system has increased the battery charge voltage in order to boost the
battery. When the criteria for stopping the battery boost is reached,
the charge voltage is lowered to commence normal charging.
variables.name: ELTEK-GENERIC-MIB::alarmBatteryBoostmodeEntered

description: Generic alarm linked to user specified alarms. These have no specific name in the MIB.
User configurable alarms will on some systems have text attached to the traps
that explains the purpose of the alarm.
